body_html:
I did some digging and it looks like for me, this might be related to the version of the code available from conda-forge. I checked the file:
~/tensorflow/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/datasets/mnist.py

Which is where that function comes from and indeed it does not have a reshape argument like the later version do. I'll try reinstalling with pip.

body:
I did some digging and it looks like for me, this might be related to the version of the code available from conda-forge. I checked the file:
~/tensorflow/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/datasets/mnist.py 

Which is where that function comes from and indeed it does not have a reshape argument like the later version do. I'll try reinstalling with pip.
